content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1603042500006{padding-top: 260px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/35_edited1.jpg?id=8412) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513003956648{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1513004658055{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1513008591637{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Wedding Event” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:85|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921700676{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/blue-white-bokeh-background-vector-6344567.jpg?id=7741) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Wedding Event” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

A wedding is that dream in a family that starts with a person’s birth and continues till the time comes for their marriage. Every moment of the wedding is a dream come true for Parents, Relatives, and the Bride and Groom themselves. In today’s time, to fulfill this dream, every family want that a mature event Company that could take all that pain and handle all the hassles of the wedding as a responsible family member and executes that event efficiently so that clients can enjoy the VIP feeling and enjoy the memorable and joyful day with their guests. There are hundreds of things that we have to take care of when we talk about a perfect wedding. Starting from the location, pre-wedding functions like Haldi, Mehandi, Major elements like catering, decoration, photography, and much more add to this infinite list. Here the role of Archi events comes into the picture where the team provides a full event management service and has high experience in planning, organization, and coordinating all these functions. We act as a smooth bridge between your gala wedding and making it happen in reality and all that within your budget and specifications.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8353″ img_size=”large” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603041414133{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/119627-white-and-gold-abstract-background-image.jpg?id=7867) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8442″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events ?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

Archi events Mature, experienced, and efficient management properly understands that feeling, emotion which is there in the family during a wedding, and our team makes sure that we execute that dream wedding with definite flawless. We imagine ourselves in the client’s place and then analyze the perspective on a micro level and plan accordingly. We make sure that not even a small and minute detail is left out in planning your Dream Wedding. The Highly skilled workforce makes sure that execution happens flawlessly, keeping in mind the terms and conditions specified in the earlier discussions. We make sure that weddings are implemented with zero error and under the personal supervision of our team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921630383{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/beautiful-white-lovely-background-with-papercut-style_112769-295.jpg?id=7825) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services We Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

  • Theme Based Decoration
  • Artificial or Mix Flower Decoration
  • Natural Flower Decoration
  • Indian & Foreign Photo Booth
  • Light Decoration
  • Special Varmala Concept
  • Bride & Groom Entry – Indian & Foreign Concept
  • Barat Welcome Concept
  • Live Guest Entertainment
  • Foreign Entertainment Artist
  • Photography

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_single_image image=”8408″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8407″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

  • Hospitality Services
  • Logistic Services
  • Security Services
  • Cooling Arrangements
  • Heat Arrangements
  • Band
  • Fire Works in Barat
  • Tentage
  • Catering & Food Preparation
  • 1st Night Room Decoration
  • Many More Services………

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
